channel.title: Borked server (ok, it turns out it's actually my client)
channel.description:
edit: it was my username "fcc" which was borked...
So seriously, I have tried to go onto moparcraft recently and I cannot destroy a single block... The client lets me destroy it and then about 3 seconds later it reappears. I have minecraft 1.5_01 with single player commands installed running on arch linux with sun's jvm.
Anyone else suffered from this problem and knows how to fix it or have any suggestions on how to fix it?

whattehp its been fixed only his account had that problem
